mapper.sql: systemUser.id as id , systemUser.login_name as loginName , systemUser.user_name as userName , systemUser.password as password , systemUser.phone as phone , systemUser.user_type as userType , systemUser.state as state , systemUser.creator_id as creatorId , systemUser.create_time as createTime , systemUser.updator_id as updatorId , systemUser.update_time as updateTime , systemUser.directly_org_id as directlyOrgId , systemUser.hierarchy_org_id as hierarchyOrgId , systemUser.certificates_type as certificatesType , systemUser.certificates_num as certificatesNum
mapper.insert:
insert into system_user_tb
id,
login_name,
user_name,
password,
phone,
user_type,
state,
creator_id,
create_time,
updator_id,
update_time,
directly_org_id,
hierarchy_org_id,
certificates_type,
certificates_num,
#{id},
#{loginName},
#{userName},
#{password},
#{phone},
#{userType},
#{state},
#{creatorId},
#{createTime},
#{updatorId},
#{updateTime},
#{directlyOrgId},
#{hierarchyOrgId},
#{certificatesType},
#{certificatesNum},
mapper.update:
update system_user_tb
login_name = #{loginName},
user_name = #{userName},
password = #{password},
phone = #{phone},
user_type = #{userType},
state = #{state},
creator_id = #{creatorId},
create_time = #{createTime},
updator_id = #{updatorId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
directly_org_id = #{directlyOrgId},
hierarchy_org_id = #{hierarchyOrgId},
certificates_type = #{certificatesType},
certificates_num = #{certificatesNum},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT aut.id,aut.pid,aut.name,aut.url,aut.icon_class,raut.role_id FROM system_authority_tb aut LEFT JOIN system_role_authority_tb raut ON aut.id=raut.auth_id WHERE aut.pid = '1' AND raut.role_id='1' ORDER BY aut.id ASC
